description:
★ "Addictive!! - I love it! Truly the first game app of hundreds I've downloaded that I moved to my home page and use more than FB! Scary addictive!" - Sammigirl2010 ★

★ "Can't stop playing!!!!! - This is a wonderful game. Hours of fun." - Gman210 ★

FREE Live Texas Hold’em Poker! Join multiplayer poker action with PlayPhone Poker. Play with friends from around the world. Enjoy smooth gameplay and riveting competition in this full-featured Texas Hold'em Poker game. Multiple buy-in levels and no-limit tables support up to 9 players per table. Beginners will find it easy and fun to learn, while competitive players will find the challenges they crave. Whatever your skill level, there’s always a table waiting for you. 


★ GREAT GAME UPDATES! ★

✓ Instantly jump onto a table with the “Play Now” button. Or, scroll through Hold’em Poker tables to choose your best table. 
✓ Met some new poker friends you’d like to play with again? Add them to your Friends List, and connect with private messages or post to their PlayPhone wall.
✓ How do you stack up against the competition? Click on profiles to see Poker stats like Best Hands and Biggest Pots Won. Check the leaderboards to see where you rank globally and among your friends.
✓ Unlock Achievements like “Fearless” and “Card Shark.”

★ FUN FEATURES! ★

✓ Play PlayPhone Poker LIVE against your friends anytime, anywhere.
✓ Get 5,000 FREE chips when you download, and 1,000 FREE chips every day you play. 
✓ Easily invite friends to join your table.
✓ Find your online PlayPhone Poker friends and quickly join their table.  
✓ Chat with friends at your poker table to bluff, taunt, celebrate, and praise. 
✓ Chat logs also display latest table wins and results.
✓ Running low on luck? Easily switch to a new poker table.
✓ Run out of chips on an All-In? No problem. Easily buy chips in-game or get them from your friends.

Check out our YouTube Channel for a game demo: youtube.com/user/PlayPhoneTV

Follow us on Facebook and Twitter:
Facebook.com/PlayPhonePoker + Twitter @PlayPhone

------------------------

A Facebook account is not required to play PlayPhone Poker. However, you may sign in with one to use your Facebook profile pic and invite your friends. PlayPhone Poker does not post or access your Facebook feeds. 

PlayPhone wants to be your mobile social gaming community. We appreciate you playing our games and all your comments.

If you are having challenges with PlayPhone Poker, Customer Service is happy to help:
www.playphone.com/Support

Join our discussions on our Community Forums:
www.playphone.com/Community
